books.title: Programming in C
books.author: Dennis Ritchie
books.summary: A foundational book covering variables, loops, arrays, functions, pointers, and structures in C. Essential for BCA Semester 1 students.

books.title: Data Structures Using C++
books.author: Mark Allen Weiss
books.summary: Comprehensive guide to stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, graphs, and sorting algorithms using C++.

books.title: Object Oriented Programming with Java
books.author: Herbert Schildt
books.summary: Explains classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, interfaces, and exception handling in Java.

books.title: Database Management Systems
books.author: Raghu Ramakrishnan
books.summary: Covers ER models, normalization, SQL, transactions, indexing, and database security.

books.title: Operating System Concepts
books.author: Abraham Silberschatz
books.summary: Detailed explanation of process management, memory management, file systems, and scheduling algorithms.

books.title: Computer Networks
books.author: Andrew S. Tanenbaum
books.summary: Introduces network models, TCP/IP, routing, switching, and network security fundamentals.

books.title: Web Development with HTML, CSS & JS
books.author: Jon Duckett
books.summary: Beginner-friendly guide to building responsive websites using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.

books.title: Python Programming
books.author: Guido van Rossum
books.summary: Covers Python fundamentals, OOP, file handling, and real-world project examples.

books.title: Software Engineering
books.author: Ian Sommerville
books.summary: Discusses SDLC models, Agile, requirement engineering, testing strategies, and maintenance.

books.title: Artificial Intelligence Basics
books.author: Stuart Russell
books.summary: Introduction to machine learning, neural networks, search algorithms, and intelligent systems.
